simplified: 一年被蛇咬十年怕井绳

pronunciation.pinyin: yī nián bèi shé yǎo shí nián pà jǐng shéng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: yi1 nian2 bei4 she2 yao3 shi2 nian2 pa4 jing3 sheng2

details.simplified: 一年被蛇咬十年怕井绳
details.traditional: 一年被蛇咬十年怕井繩

meanings.value: bitten by a snake in one year, fears the well rope for ten years ; once bitten twice shy
